00022 class Executor {
00024 public:
00025         Executor (void) {};
00026         
00032         void execute (Job* job) {
00033                 pid_t pid;
00034                 int status, err;
00035                 pid_t w;
00036                                 
00037                 pid = fork();
00038                 
00039                 if (pid < 0)    throw -1;
00040                 else if (pid == 0) { // o filho executa o processo
00041                         if (!job->inBG()) //se for foreground
00042                                 tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, job->getPGID()); //vira o dono do terminal
00043                         // seta todos handlers para default
00044                         signal (SIGINT, SIG_DFL);
00045                         signal (SIGQUIT, SIG_DFL);
00046                         signal (SIGTSTP, SIG_DFL);
00047                         signal (SIGTTIN, SIG_DFL);
00048                         signal (SIGTTOU, SIG_DFL);
00049                         signal (SIGCHLD, SIG_DFL);
00050                         
00051                         job->setPGID(getpid());
00052                         setpgid (getpid(), getpid());
00053                         
00054                         if (job->hasPipe()) { // se houver pipe, manda para o piper executar
00055                         
00056                                 Piper piper;
00057                                 piper.execPipe (job);
00058                         } else { // se nao houver, executa
00059                                 job->getProcess(0)->setPID(getpid());
00060                                 
00061                                 if (job->getProcess(0)->hasRedirection()) {
00062                                         Redirector r;
00063                                         r.init (job->getProcess(0)->getFilenames(), job->getProcess(0)->getRedirFlags());
00064                                 }
00065                                         
00066                                 if (execvp(job->getProcess(0)->getCommand()[0], job->getProcess(0)->getCommand()) == -1) {
00067                                         fprintf (stderr, "Erro no execvp\n");
00068                                         exit (1);
00069                                 }
00070                                 exit (0);
00071                         }
00072                 } else { // shell
00073                         std::cout << '[' << job->getID() << "]\t" << pid << std::endl;
00074                         job->getProcess(0)->setPID(pid);
00075                         job->setPGID(pid);
00076                         setpgid (pid, pid);
00077                         if (!job->inBG()) {
00078                                 tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, pid);
00079                                 
00080                                 while ((w = waitpid(pid, &status, WUNTRACED)) == -1 && (err = errno) == EINTR);
00081                                 if (w == -1) { // se deu erro
00082                                         fprintf (stderr, "Erro: Executor: ");
00083                                         if (err == ECHILD)      fprintf (stderr, "processo (%d) nao existe ou nao eh meu filho\n", pid);
00084                                         else    fprintf (stderr, "EINVAL\n");
00085                                 } else {
00086                                         // devolve o terminal para a shell
00087                                         tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, job->getTermios());
00088                                         tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, &shooSHTermios);
00089                                         tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, shooSHPGID);
00090                                 }
00091                         } else
00092                                 tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, job->getTermios()); // Pega os atributos do job
00093                 }
00094         }
00096 };
